portfolio.title: Metal Industry
portfolio.projectDescription: Our collaboration with  Sheet Metal Industries involved a comprehensive digital transformation of their operations, revolutionizing their efficiency and effectiveness across the board. We streamlined processes, implemented advanced solutions, and facilitated seamless integration to enhance productivity and customer satisfaction.

portfolio.title: Rubber Industry
portfolio.projectDescription: Rubber parts manufacturing involves use of die on heated machines which complicates the production planning as any mismanagement in order prioritisation can lead to high cost overheads and time loss in achieving timely production
